cs.LO, cs.DS, cs.PL, cs.DM, cs.SC. 

The paper deals with the termination of loops, which is a topic in the area of formal methods and program analysis. The use of linear functions and polyhedra in the paper suggests that it belongs to the sub-category of Logic in Computer Science (cs.LO). The paper also deals with algorithms and complexity, which suggests that it could belong to the sub-category of Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS). The paper introduces a new representation for single-path loops, which suggests that it could belong to the sub-category of Programming Languages (cs.PL). The paper also deals with the structure of multiphase ranking functions, which suggests that it could belong to the sub-category of Discrete Mathematics (cs.DM). Finally, the paper deals with the relation between multiphase ranking functions and recurrent sets, which suggests that it could belong to the sub-category of Symbolic Computation (cs.SC).
